meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The tricycle is a tripartite vehicle with three wheels.
meanings.sent2: The clover leaf is a tripartite plant with three leaves.
meanings.sent3: The tripartite cake had three layers of different flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her tripartite necklace symbolized her past, present, and future.
meanings.sent5: The tripartite puzzle required solving three distinct sections.

meanings.sent1: The tripartite negotiation included representatives from three countries.
meanings.sent2: The tripartite agreement was signed by three organizations.
meanings.sent3: The tripartite dance competition featured teams of three dancers each.
meanings.sent4: Their tripartite alliance proved to be a strong force in the conflict.
meanings.sent5: The tripartite committee made decisions collectively with input from all three groups.
